DOC.brief_summary: This study determine amount vitamin D require low birth weight infant reach vitamin D sufficiency achieve optimal calcium health bone growth .
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Vitamin D Deficiency Very Low Birth Weight Infant ( VLBW ) Infants Part 2
DOC.criteria: Any infant born Medical University South Carolina < 34 week gestation Less 1500g birth AGA Must African American Caucasian Each infant bear twin triplet pregnancy eligible Infants major congenital anomaly hemolytic disease require exchange transfusion Infants born small forgestationalage ( SGA ) large forgestationalage ( LGA ) Maternal uncontrolled thyroid disease Maternal Parathyroid disease Infants race African American Caucasian
